messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] chrstians homeschooling and the rest of us sliding
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: SandraDodd@aol.com To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Saturday, September 07, 2002 12:36 PM Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] chrstians
messages.messageBody:
---- Original Message -----
From: SandraDodd@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, September 07, 2002 12:36 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] chrstians homeschooling and the rest of us sliding



In a message dated 9/7/02 7:48:44 AM, lhgreene2000@... writes:

<< Sometimes I feel like there is only one type
of christian...the fundamentalist type! >>

According to them, they are the only true Christians.
According the the homeschooling faction of them (A LARGE FACTION), christian
homeschoolers invented homeschooling in the mid 1980's and caused it to be
legal in every state, after which secular homeschoolers who are homeschooling
for NO good reason, since God didn't command them to, rode on their coattails
and are screwing it all up.

Sandra


Pretty scary isn't it? They're the ones that are abusive, intolerant and arrogant. I gave my father a shirt that says "Ask the native indians about Christian love." I love it!!! ;o)

Linda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
